info.name: Misc Items from Point Setting Guide

description.p: This golden stein is decorated with dancing dwarves and grain patterns. Speaking the command word ("Illefarn") while grasping the handle fills the tankard with three pints of rich dwarven ale. This power can be used up to three times per day.

A brass and leather belt engraved in runes with five loops to hold alcholic liquid containers. When a bottle is placed within a loop the runes along the loop alight. By spending a charge as a Free Action, you can replicate any Very Rare or lower Potion. You can also throw this item at a target to deliver the potion effect as long as the words "Order Up" are said to the target.
The weapon contains 4 charges which recharge at dawn.
Whilst wearing this inside any library, the wearer gains advantage or a +5 (whichever is higher) on intelligence checks to find books or information.

This solid white sand is made from the crystallized bones of a powerful Sorcerer and is steeped in magic. This sand can be substituted for the material component of a spell with a required value of less than 1,000 GP.
Using Sorcerer's Sand as a component increases the power of the spell as follows:
Sorcerer's Sand can be used to increase the power of the spell by one spell level per ounce used.

Multiple ounces of Sorcerer's Sand can be used to increase the Save DC or To-Hit of a spell. To increase the Save DC or To-Hit a number of ounces must be used equal to the desired increase times 2, for example; a +1 modifier will take 2 ounces, a +2 modifier will take 4 ounces, a +3 modifier will take 6 ounces, etc.
These black hide boots glisten when in the darkness.
As your move action you can instead teleport.

In order to teleport, choose how far you want to travel, then do an Arcana check. The DC equals 5+1 for each five feet (1 square) traveled. If you do not succeed on the DC check your teleport fails. Has 3 charges, refills charges every day at dawn.
A cloak of charcoal and orange patches that feels warm to the touch.
Woven in Flame: Whenever you would take fire damage, you take 1d4 less damage.
False Shadow: Once per day, you can make your shadow appear as if it was cast from a creature that could be mistaken as a dragon.
Magically Reinforced: +1 to Armor Class
A set of green robes decorated with elaborate stars and enchanted belts.
Magical Archive: You gain advantage with Arcana and Knowledge Checks.
Magically Reinforced: +1 to Armor Class
A brass and copper syringe with multiple chambers to hold liquid. The chambers spin around the center of the syringe.
Vast Storage: This syringe can store up to a total fluid amount of a gallon. This can also hold up to 10 different liquids.
Fast Fluids: As an Action, you can suck up or dispense up to a gallon of fluid from a source. This cannot be used to drain a living creature of fluids from its body.
Platter-sized tray made of silver with carved feathers across the surface. A very lightweight item for being made out of metal and the size.

Hold Tray: As an Action, whistling a specific tune will cause this item to freeze in space. You can as a Bonus Actions whistle a second tune to release it. It supports up to one person's weight (Up to 250lbs.) and can be forcibly moved with a Strength Save DC 12.
A beautiful silver bell with ornate decorations. This bell cannot make noise since it is missing the chime in it.
Servant's Silence: When this bell is rung, no noise can be created within a 5 foot space. This only lasts for six seconds. This can only be used four times a day.
A long lost set of bones from a powerful saint of the past made into an ornate necklace.
Restless Bones: Will rattle ominously when a lie is uttered or undead are nearby.
A copper and brass metal can about the size of a fist with gears and a valve on the side.

Can Can Man: As an Action, you can turn the value to activate the Tin Buddy. The can then opens and activates the mechanism inside transforming the can into a thin mechanical automaton. This automaton has the stat block: HP 2, AC 10, STR 3 (-4), DEX 10 (+0), CON 10 (+0), INT 3 (-4), WIS 10 (+0), CHA 7 (-2). It is loud (Disadvantage on Stealth), annoying (Disadvantage on Charisma checks), and is not very skilled (No Skill bonuses). It also has no real means of fighting by default. It stays activated for 10 hours or until dispelled.
